QuestData.Title: The Escape
QuestData.Description: I suppose I'll learn as we go... Couldn't be too hard. Just some buttons here, and a lever or two... Well, are you ready to go?
QuestData.AreaDescription: Escort Wizzlecrank out of the Venture Co. drill site
QuestData.LogDescription: Protect Wizzlecrank and the stolen goblin shredder on the way out of the Sludge Fens.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Talk to Sputtervalve at Nozzlepot's Outpost in Northern Barrens.
QuestData.RewardText: He wrecked it!?$B$B<Sputtervalve mutters angrily to himself before continuing>.$B$BHopefully we'll be able to get something of value from the wrecked shredder prototype... my business depends on it! I'll start tearing that sucker apart and we'll see what makes it tick.$b$bOh, let me give you something for your trouble, too.
